com.kissmetrics.sdk

Interface TrackingRunnables

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TrackingRunnablesNonTrackingState, TrackingRunnablesTrackingState

    public interface TrackingRunnables
    TrackingRunnables interface Classes implementing this interface provide Runnable objects to handle tracking for specific tracking states.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Runnable alias(java.lang.String alias, java.lang.String identity, Archiver archiver, KISSmetricsAPI kmapi)
      Creates a Runnable to archive and send an alias for the current tracking state.
      java.lang.Runnable clearIdentity(java.lang.String newIdentity, Archiver archiver)
      Creates a Runnable to archive an unassociated user identity for the current tracking state.
      java.lang.Runnable identify(java.lang.String identity, Archiver archiver, KISSmetricsAPI kmapi)
      Creates a Runnable to archive and send an identity for the current tracking state.
      java.lang.Runnable record(java.lang.String name, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> properties, KISSmetricsAPI.RecordCondition condition, Archiver archiver, KISSmetricsAPI kmapi)
      Creates a Runnable to archive and send an event with or without properties(null) for the current tracking state.
      java.lang.Runnable recordOnce(java.lang.String name, Archiver archiver, KISSmetricsAPI kmapi)
      Creates a Runnable to archive and send an event only once per identity for the current tracking state.
      java.lang.Runnable set(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> properties, Archiver archiver, KISSmetricsAPI kmapi)
      Creates a Runnable to archive and send 1 or more user properties for the current tracking state.
      java.lang.Runnable setDistinct(java.lang.String key, java.lang.String value, Archiver archiver, KISSmetricsAPI kmapi)
      Creates a Runnable to archive and send properties with a new or different value for the provided key for the current tracking state.

    • Method Detail

      • identify

        java.lang.Runnable identify(java.lang.String identity,
                          Archiver archiver,
                          KISSmetricsAPI kmapi)
        Creates a Runnable to archive and send an identity for the current tracking state.
        Parameters:
        identity - User identity String.
        archiver - The instance of Archiver to use.
        kmapi - The instance of KISSmetricsAPI where initiation of recursive send should occur.
        Returns:
        A Runnable object that will run appropriate tasks for the current tracking state.

      • alias

        java.lang.Runnable alias(java.lang.String alias,
                       java.lang.String identity,
                       Archiver archiver,
                       KISSmetricsAPI kmapi)
        Creates a Runnable to archive and send an alias for the current tracking state.
        Parameters:
        alias - User alias String.
        identity - User identity String.
        archiver - The instance of Archiver to use.
        kmapi - The instance of KISSmetricsAPI where initiation of recursive send should occur.
        Returns:
        A Runnable object that will run appropriate tasks for the current tracking state.

      • clearIdentity

        java.lang.Runnable clearIdentity(java.lang.String newIdentity,
                               Archiver archiver)
        Creates a Runnable to archive an unassociated user identity for the current tracking state.
        Parameters:
        identity - User identity String.
        archiver - The instance of Archiver to use.
        Returns:
        A Runnable object that will run appropriate tasks for the current tracking state.

      • record

        java.lang.Runnable record(java.lang.String name,
                        java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> properties,
                        KISSmetricsAPI.RecordCondition condition,
                        Archiver archiver,
                        KISSmetricsAPI kmapi)
        Creates a Runnable to archive and send an event with or without properties(null) for the current tracking state.
        Parameters:
        name - Event name.
        properties - A HashMap of property names/keys and value pairs or null.
        condition - A RecordCondition of always, per installation or per identity.
        archiver - The instance of Archiver to use.
        kmapi - The instance of KISSmetricsAPI where initiation of recursive send should occur.
        Returns:
        A Runnable object that will run appropriate tasks for the current tracking state.

      • recordOnce

        java.lang.Runnable recordOnce(java.lang.String name,
                            Archiver archiver,
                            KISSmetricsAPI kmapi)
        Creates a Runnable to archive and send an event only once per identity for the current tracking state.
        Parameters:
        name - Event name.
        archiver - The instance of Archiver to use.
        kmapi - The instance of KISSmetricsAPI where initiation of recursive send should occur.
        Returns:
        A Runnable object that will run appropriate tasks for the current tracking state.

      • set

        java.lang.Runnable set(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> properties,
                     Archiver archiver,
                     KISSmetricsAPI kmapi)
        Creates a Runnable to archive and send 1 or more user properties for the current tracking state.
        Parameters:
        properties - A HashMap of 1 or more property name/keys and value pairs.
        archiver - The instance of Archiver to use.
        kmapi - The instance of KISSmetricsAPI where initiation of recursive send should occur.
        Returns:
        A Runnable object that will run appropriate tasks for the current tracking state.

      • setDistinct

        java.lang.Runnable setDistinct(java.lang.String key,
                             java.lang.String value,
                             Archiver archiver,
                             KISSmetricsAPI kmapi)
        Creates a Runnable to archive and send properties with a new or different value for the provided key for the current tracking state.
        Parameters:
        key - A property name/key.
        value - A value for the provided property name/key.
        archiver - The instance of Archiver to use.
        kmapi - The instance of KISSmetricsAPI where initiation of recursive send should occur.
        Returns:
        A Runnable object that will run appropriate tasks for the current tracking state.
